concept.title: Appendix: Additional configurations for Kafka cluster

conbody.p: NS can send outbound notifications to an external Kafka cluster. Multiple Kafka clusters can be configured to receive these notifications in parallel or in a primary/secondary manner. The NS Kafka client can also communicate with the external Kafka cluster using SSL with (or without) SASL authentication.
All known properties of the Kafka producer can be passed on to the NS Kafka client via custom properties defined in the SM GUI.
The NS Kafka client can also communicate with the external Kafka cluster using SSL with (or without) SASL authentication.
